description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. "Dark Storm Blast 360" is a multi directional shooting game. The player must use both sticks to move the land fighter and destroy the target. Experience 8 levels. Copyright 2013 MUKAGOSOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT
